offersData.title: Prepay & Save
offersData.description: Prepay your stay and save up to 10% on rates. Rates are per guestroom (single or double occupancy) and include breakfast, Wi-Fi, VAT, service charge, and municipality fee (except climate resilience fee of €10.00 per room per night). Additional benefits include:
benefits: Two sunbeds per room on the renowned Nammos Beach
offersData.note: *Available up to 30 days prior the arrival date

offersData.title: Suite Offers
offersData.description: Book a suite for 5 nights or more and enjoy a complimentary roundtrip transfer, champagne and fruits, and private in-room check-in. Additional benefits include:
benefits: Two sunbeds per room on the renowned Nammos Beach
terms: Seasonal cancellation and deposit period applies

offersData.title: Stay 4, Pay 3
offersData.description: Book up to 30 days prior to arrival and take advantage of our "Stay 4, Pay 3" offer. Rates are per guestroom (single or double occupancy) and include breakfast, Wi-Fi, VAT, service charge, and municipality fee (except climate resilience fee of €10.00 per room per night). Additional benefits include:
benefits: Two sunbeds per room on the renowned Nammos Beach
